legend.description: A character or expression vector to appear in the legend

fill.description: If specified, this argument will produce boxes filled withthe specified colors to appear beside the legend text

pch.description: A numeric vector plotting symbols appearing in the legend

lty.description: The line types for lines appearing in the legend

title.description: A character value giving a title to be placed atthe top of the legend

fontsize.description: A numeric specifying text fontsize in points

border.description: A logical value indicating whether to add a borderaround heatmap legend

bg.description: A character value indicating background color

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying legend x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying legend y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying legend width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying legend height

just.description: A string specifying the justification of legend relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only givenas numerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics output shouldbe produced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
